title: "Study: Artificial intelligence to help identify abnormal urinary flows"
excerpt: "The deep learning tool, Audioflow, performed almost as well as a specialist machine used in clinics, and achieves similar results to urology residents in assessing urinary flow. The current study focuses on sound created by urine in a soundproof environment,"
